Package Model.discount

Interface Discount

All Known Implementing Classes:
DatePriceModifier, IWorkHereDiscount, PaydayDiscount, Stay4Get1Discount
public interface Discount
The interface for any price altering classes in the program (discount codes and date price modifier).
Author:
Ryan Gemal

    float
    applyDiscount(Client client, float price)
    Interface method for applying a discount.

  • Method Details

    • applyDiscount

      float applyDiscount(Client client, float price)
      Interface method for applying a discount.
      Parameters:
      client - the Client where the discount will be applied to
      price - the current calculated price before applying the discount
      Returns:
      the new reservation price of the Client
